roleset.name: dream while awake, fantasize

example.name: arg0
example.text: My SECOND -LRB- long story -RRB- drivers Ed teacher yelled : I do n't know what 's wrong with you . You just start daydreaming or something !

roleset.note: DAYDREAM-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to dream.01 (from daydream.01-v)
